name: Risecoin
additional_notices:
The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en: Risecoin is the governance token of the Risebit ecosystem. It is developed under the ERC-20 standard on the Binance Smart Chain.
